[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a885fc6368724a74000a68#post_55a885fc6368724a74000a68
Single edge as opposed to the Jian, the scholar's sword.[/bq]
The jian would be like the unicorn class weapon if in MLP. While pegasi and earth ponies typically use bows, pole arms, and dao swords.

My OC specializes in jian sword techniques.
